plugins.mediaLibraryPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your media library. This will let $(PRODUCT_NAME) download images to your device.
plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos. I dont know why it needs this permission.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save photos. This will let $(PRODUCT_NAME) download images to your device.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos. I dont know why it needs this permission.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save photos. This will let $(PRODUCT_NAME) download images to your device.
